com.sponsorpay.sdk.android
Class UrlBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.sponsorpay.sdk.android.UrlBuilder

public class UrlBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

Contains utility methods to build URLs used to access the SponsorPay's back-end API.

validateKeyValueParams

public static void validateKeyValueParams(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> kvParams)
Checks that the passed Map of key/value parameters doesn't contain empty or null keys or values. If it does, triggers an IllegalArgumentException.

Parameters:
kvParams -

mapKeysToValues

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> mapKeysToValues(java.lang.String[] keys,
                                                                               java.lang.String[] values)
Constructs a Map of key / value parameters given an array of keys and an array of values. If any of the arrays contains empty of null values, an IllegalArgumentException will be triggered.

Parameters:
keys - An array of keys
values - an array of values in the same order than the provided array of keys
Returns:
a Map of keys / values

newBuilder

public static UrlBuilder newBuilder(java.lang.String resourceUrl,
                                    HostInfo hostInfo)
Deprecated. This method will be removed from a future SDK release. Get a UrlBuilder instance with newBuilder(String, SPCredentials) instead.

Used to retrieved a new UrlBuilder.

Parameters:
resourceUrl - The base URL for this builder.
hostInfo - The HostInfo holding device information
Returns:
a new UrlBuilder

newBuilder

public static UrlBuilder newBuilder(java.lang.String resourceUrl,
                                    SPCredentials credentials)

Used to retrieved a new UrlBuilder.

Parameters:
resourceUrl - The base URL for this builder.
credentials - The SPCredentials holding the values (userId, appId and secret key) to be used within this builder.
Returns:
a new UrlBuilder
